summary: An email chain from July 2, 2020, detailing the strict custody restrictions and monitoring protocols for Ghislaine Maxwell at Merrimack DOC in New Hampshire. It outlines security measures, observation schedules, and authorized communication only with her legal counsel.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The high-profile inmate subject to strict custody restrictions and monitoring at Merrimack DOC.

persons.name: Lawrence Vogelman
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell's authorized attorney, with whom she is permitted to communicate after providing the appropriate PIN.

connections.description: Maxwell is authorized to communicate only with her legal counsel, Lawrence Vogelman, under strict protocols.

events.title: Custody Restrictions Implementation
events.description: Strict custody restrictions are put in place for Ghislaine Maxwell at Merrimack DOC, including housing in medical, SRT personnel posting, 15-minute observation watch, and limited communication.

events.title: Documentation Delivery Deadline
events.description: Supervisors are directed to deliver documentation and video footage from Maxwell's monitoring to a specified location.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell is housed in medical at Merrimack DOC under high-security restrictions due to her high-profile status.
She is on a 15-minute observation watch, with SRT personnel posted in medical and all rounds documented.
Communication is strictly limited to her legal counsel, Lawrence Vogelman, after he provides the appropriate PIN.
Staff are prohibited from making statements to the press regarding Maxwell or standard operating procedures.
